sql:
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM title t, movie_companies mc, cast_info ci
WHERE t.id = mc.movie_id AND t.id = ci.movie_id AND t.production_year  <  1987 AND mc.company_type_id  =  2 AND ci.person_id  <  1176719 AND ci.role_id  =  1
